title: How to export the contact from phone to computer？
answer:
You can export contacts from your communications device or SIM/USIM card. The exported contacts are saved in a *.htm, *.txt, *.xls, *.vcf, *.mdb or *.csv file.  
1、Click![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111122161248.PNG) .  
2、Select Device or SIM/USIM.  
3、Perform either of the following operations:  
      Right-click the contact list and choose Export All Contacts.  
      Select one or more contacts and right-click to choose Export Selected Contacts.  
4、Choose the path for saving the contacts.  
5、Enter a file name and click Save.
